TopicTitle: Annoying glitch with landing gear on duna?

Articles.Content:
I landed an ssto plane on duna, something I haven't done since 1.05, and as soon as my craft came to a stop on a flat surface, strange behavior happened. It was drifting left and rotating around it's front landing gear, even though steering was disabled on all gear and brakes were on at 200%.... very annoying! To make it stand still so I could time accelerate I had to gear down. Anyone else had this glitch?

Edited June 27, 2016 by Screeno
Autocorrect is crap
Welcome to 1.1.  This is known, and will hopefully be fixed in 1.2.4.
